metadata.description: Love is constantly changing, never the same. Chishin, a gay monk, stuck in his own thought of "I will never falling in love again", because of his past trauma. But a free-spirited new trainee Keijyu brought a tornado into Chishin's heart. Confused by the pure and free words and action of Keiju. Black-haired cute Keiju brings Chishin back the feelings of love. Monk costumes! A true boy's love story! The monks put their full hearts into love and self-development.
metadata.name: 108 Complexes (Yaoi Manga)
